# **![][image1]**

*The Residency for the next renaissance of Artists, Hackers and Builders.* 

---

## **Who we are**

Similar to HF0 style and Founder Inc. vibe, we’re an *early-stage startup accelerator* and *lifelong community for founders*. We help young founders turn their spark into startup. 

You may take a glance at our site: [https://www.sparklab.city/](https://www.sparklab.city/)  
And our launching video: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dWzJeUIc1D4](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dWzJeUIc1D4) 

## **What we do**

**Culture**: We believe great companies emerge when founders find their authentic selves. what we call a "Spark"—an inner fire waiting to be ignited. Our role as catalysts is to help young people answer the fundamental question of "why we set out" and become who they're meant to be. We're building an ecosystem where the unconventional can thrive, where taste matters as much as execution, and where the next renaissance of builders can find their voice and their tribe.

**Container**: A 6-week residency program in our co-living space where 10 teams of founders live, build, and grow together. We offer access to EIRs and other mentors. This isn't just workspace \- it's full immersion with shared meals, late-night discussions, and genuine friendship.

**Community**: Beyond residency, members join a lasting network of builders, operators, and thinkers. No equity required for community membership \- only when we actively invest.

**Capital**: $10K uncapped SAFE for selected teams, with potential follow-on up to $1M. We maintain first-look rights but more importantly, we remain long-term partners regardless of investment decisions.

## **Who it’s for**

* 10x founder, building since before 20  
* Young builders (18-25) with demonstrated excellence in any field  
* Founders tackling "toy-like" projects with massive potential  
* Prototype-to-Scale Founder, high-agency individuals who navigate the world on their own terms  
* Design technologist, with taste in emerging art, technology, and culture  
* Target: \>70% portfolio companies achieve follow-on funding or profitability
